name: Multidimensional Ogre
description:
Multidimensional Ogre

Help Natalie the friendly Ogre to go downstairs to get her favourite sandwich.

Through her talent for dimensional travels she can get more food in one go. Very important for every ogre with a sense of good taste and a lot of hunger.

It’s our first game. Hope you like it!
